name: Angry Birds Classic Texture File
summary: A ZSTREAM file is a texture used in Angry Birds Classic and other old Angry Birds video games. It contains an image used to show an in-game background, item, or character. ZSTREAM files are contained in .stream.7z files, which are .7Z archives found in Angry Birds games' data/​images/​base directories.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
